content.title: Fall 2021.
content.description: Home is more than a place. It’s an experience of being known, being connected with others and finding purpose and meaning as we serve and love each other.  We never stopped being the church during COVID but it sure felt different and even though it will still be different this fall we want to welcome everyone to experience a sense of home as we share life and learn about Jesus together.

image1.alt: Young woman in a face mask is sitting and smiling off camera as she talks to a friend.
Young man in a face mask is sitting and talking with friends.

content.text1: Home is more than a place. It’s an experience of being known, being connected with others, and finding purpose and meaning as we serve and love each other. This fall, we want to welcome you to experience a sense of home as we share life and learn about Jesus together.
Church is going to look and feel different this fall. Wherever you're at, we’re excited to help you get more engaged and connected into community.

list.title: Sunday Mornings
list.text: Sunday mornings will be a blend of in-person gatherings and online livestream experiences. So whether you're in person or tuning in from home, you'll be able to learn, grow, and engage in the same teaching each week. For now, click here to join our livestream on Sundays at 10am EDT.
list.imageAlt: Watching the teaching from Bruxy Cavey during The Meeting House Sunday morning livestream.

list.title: Home Church
list.text: We'll have in-person and online Home Churches across all our parishes where you can share life, grow deeper spiritual friendships, ask questions, and talk about Jesus together. Click here to find a group you can connect with.
list.imageAlt: Online home church meeting using zoom.

list.title: Kids and Youth
list.text: We can't wait to start meeting back in person this fall! The how and when looks different across our parishes, so check out your parish page to learn more about local programs.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

content.text1: We're created to live, grow, and thrive in community. This fall, there are lots of opportunities for you to get involved in helping out on Sunday mornings or throughout the week in your neighbourhood.

image1.alt: A woman is on her phone outside.

content.text1: We've been called to a life of radical generosity, like Jesus! Giving is one of the ways you can show commitment to Jesus and this church family. Thank you!

image1.alt: A viewer is watching The Meeting House livestream on their laptop.
A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Subscribe to our email list and stay on top of the changing circumstances as we navigate this pandemic.
